Styleguide Template

Boilerplate for creating components based style guides using Jekyll. Here is the Github repository for it, should you want to have a peek at the code, fork it or report an issue.

If you want to make sure your types are grouped (file names are not enough), you could use this group_by loop instead

</article>

  <input type="button" class="button" value="Button text">
</div>

</article>

Comments

HTML file: /_includes/comments


Dialogue & Discussion

<div class="panel">
	<h3 id="comments" class="t60">Dialogue &amp; Discussion</h3>
	<div id="disqus_thread"></div>
	<script type="text/javascript">
	    /* * * CONFIGURATION VARIABLES: EDIT BEFORE PASTING INTO YOUR WEBPAGE * * */
	    var disqus_shortname = 'InfiniteAbstraction';
	    var disqus_identifier = '/components/comments.html';

	    /* * * DON'T EDIT BELOW THIS LINE * * */
	    (function() {
	        var dsq = document.createElement('script'); dsq.type = 'text/javascript'; dsq.async = true;
	        dsq.src = '//' + disqus_shortname + '.disqus.com/embed.js';
	        (document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0] || document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0]).appendChild(dsq);
	    })();
	</script>
	<noscript>Please enable JavaScript to view the <a href="http://disqus.com/?ref_noscript">comments powered by Disqus.</a></noscript>
<div class="panel">

Contact

HTML file: contact.md


Fill out my online form.
Online contact and registration forms from Wufoo. 
<div class="panel">
  <div id="wufoo-m1jiol310nol7rh">
    Fill out my <a href="https://xocolatl.wufoo.com/forms/m1jiol310nol7rh">online form</a>.
  </div>
  <div id="wuf-adv" style="font-family:inherit;font-size: small;color:#a7a7a7;text-align:center;display:block;">Online contact and registration forms from <a href="http://www.wufoo.com">Wufoo</a>.
  </div>
  <script type="text/javascript">var m1jiol310nol7rh;(function(d, t) {
    var s = d.createElement(t), options = {
    'userName':'xocolatl',
    'formHash':'m1jiol310nol7rh',
    'autoResize':true,
    'height':'490',
    'async':true,
    'host':'wufoo.com',
    'header':'show',
    'ssl':true};
    s.src = ('https:' == d.location.protocol ? 'https://' : 'http://') + 'www.wufoo.com/scripts/embed/form.js';
    s.onload = s.onreadystatechange = function() {
    var rs = this.readyState; if (rs) if (rs != 'complete') if (rs != 'loaded') return;
    try { m1jiol310nol7rh = new WufooForm();m1jiol310nol7rh.initialize(options);m1jiol310nol7rh.display(); } catch (e) {}};
    var scr = d.getElementsByTagName(t)[0], par = scr.parentNode; par.insertBefore(s, scr);
    })(document, 'script');
  </script>
</div>

Texts

Sass file: /_sass/base/typography.scss


Level one title

Large text (21px) Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Incidunt veritatis sequi nobis earum dicta vero impedit esse at, debitis doloremque eius inventore qui, et dolores eaque eos iste repellendus non.

Level two title

Default text (16px) Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
